Uses of Class
mireka.filter.dnsbl.Dnsbl

  • Packages that use Dnsbl 
    Package Description
    mireka.filter.dnsbl
    Provides a filter which queries one or more DNSBLs (DNS-based Block Lists) and rejects mails bases on the result.
